title: andamadE paravasha (bhAvgIt)
sahitya:
andamadE paravasha mandenadE candamadE kannula vinduladE


caraNam 1    madilO madhuvai madanA krtiyai pilicenadE celi hoyalu vagalu balu bhangimalai nilicenulE
    caraNam 2    jIvanavanilO aDugaDuguna nI nIDanulE kSaNamainA ninu nE kalalOnainA vIDanulE
    caraNam 3    nAlO nilicE nAkai pilicE nIvevarOyani talaci talaci nIkai valaci vEcitinE
    caraNam 4    cirunavvulalO virimallelavE virisenulE cirakAlamu nI siriyai darini murisedalE
    caraNam 5    nAlO ninnu nIlO nannu kaNTimilE kaugililO oDilO jagamu maraciyuNTimilE
